ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A counterbore_definition is a type of
that defines the boreing feature of a counterbore hole in a design context.
See Figure 1 for an illustration of the attributes.
counterbore_definition attributes
specifies the that provides the required diameter of the bore.
specifies the that provides the required depth of the bore.

ext_description.p:
The counterbore_hole_definition is a type of
that defines a template structure that provides the parametric requirements for a counterbore hole in a design context. The template includes one or more ordered to provide a sequence of bores, and a drilled hole.
ext_description.note: See Figure 2 for an illustration of the attributes.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the list of bores that make up a compound counterbore hole, arranged by ascending order of diameter.
specifies the that provides the required depth of the drilled hole.
specifies the that provides the required diameter of the drilled hole.
specifies that the drilled hole is required to be completely through the item being drilled.

ext_description.p: the members of counterbore_definition shall be sorted in an ascending order, organized according to diameter.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The member of counterbore_hole_definition provided shall specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item or it shall specify a depth; however a member of counterbore_hole_definition provided shall not specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item and also specify a depth.

A counterbore_hole_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of a
in a design definition.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the .
the counterbore_hole occurence shall be associated with a .

A counterbore_hole_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a
that is an assembly. A counterbore_hole_occurrence_in_assembly specifies a list of components that the hole shall modify.
specifies the list of that provides the components in the assembly that the hole alters.

ext_description.p:
A countersink_hole_definition is a type of
that defines a template to structure the requirements for a countersink hole.
ext_description.note: See Figure 4 for an illustration of the attributes.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the required starting diameter of the larger hole on the part surface
specifies the required angle for the countersink.
specifies the tolerance of the countersink angle specification The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.
specifies the required diameter of the smaller hole of the countersink hole
specifies the required depth of the smaller hole of the countersink hole
specifies that the drilled hole is required to be completely through the item being drilled.

The member of countersink_hole_definition provided shall specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item or it shall specify a depth; however a member of countersink_hole_definition provided shall not specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item and also specify a depth.

A countersink_hole_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of a
in a design definition.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the countersink_hole_occurrence.
the countersink_hole occurence shall be associated with a product_definition.

A countersink_hole_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the list of that provides the components in the assembly that the hole alters.

ext_description.p:
A counterdrill_hole_definition is a type of
that defines a template to structure the requirements for a counterdrilled hole.
ext_description.note: See Figure 3 for an illustration of the attributes.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the required angle for the counterdrill.
specifies the tolerance of the counterdrill angle specification. The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.
specifies the that provides the required diameter of the drilled hole.
specifies the that provides the required depth of the drilled hole.
specifies the bore that helps compose a counterdrill_hole_definition..
specifies that the depth of the smaller hole is completely through the item.

The member of counterdrill_hole_definition provided shall specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item or it shall specify a depth; however a member of counterdrill_hole_definition provided shall not specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item and also specify a depth.

A counterdrill_hole_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of a
in a design definition.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the
the counterdrill_hole occurence shall be associated with a product_definition.

A counterdrill_hole_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the list of that provides the components in the assembly that the hole alters.
A hole_depth is an entity that provides the requirements for the drill depth of a hole.
specifies the required depth of the hole measured from the part surface.
specifies the tolerance of the depth. The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.
A hole_diameter is an entity that provides the requirements for the diameter of a hole
specifies the required diameter of the hole.
specifies the tolerance of the diameter. The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.
If a limits_and_fits is provided for the diameter_tolerance, the limits_and_fits data shall be that data applicable to a hole.

An implicit_counterbore_hole_definition is a type of
that defines the location and direction of a hole from the drilled surface but does not provide explicit geometry.
specifies a geometric model that includes the placement origin for the hole definition.
There shall be exactly one item in the geometric model specified by position.
The item in the geometric model shall be an .

A implicit_counterdrill_hole_definition is a type of
that defines the location and direction of a hole from the drilled surface but does not provide explicit geometry.
specifies a geometric model that includes the placement origin for the hole definition.
There shall be exactly one item in the geometric model specified by position.
The item in the geometric model shall be an .

A implicit_countersink_hole_definition is a type of
that defines the location and direction of a hole from the drilled surface.
specifies a geometric model that includes the placement origin for the hole definition.
There shall be exactly one item in the geometric model specified by position.
The item in the geometric model shall be an .

A implicit_spotface_definition is a type of and
that defines the location and direction of a hole from the drilled surface.

ext_description.p:
A spotface_definition is a type of
in which a radius is applied to the bottom surface of the outside diameter.
ext_description.note: See Figure 5 for an illustration of the attributes.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the required fillet radius on the bottom of the larger hole.
specifies the tolerance of the specified fillet radius. The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.

A spotface_hole_definition is a type of
in which a radius is applied to the bottom surface of each bore.
NOTE: per ASME Y14.5
specifies the list of bores that make up a compound spotface hole, arranged by ascending order of diameter.

A spotface_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of a
in a design definition.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the .

A spotface_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the .
